00045 BOOLEAN     gfAniEditMode = FALSE;
00046 static UINT16           usStartAnim = 0;
00047 static UINT8            ubStartHeight = 0;
00048 static SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00049 
00050 static BOOLEAN fOKFiles = FALSE;
00051 static UINT8       ubNumStates = 0;
00052 static UINT16   *pusStates = NULL;
00053 static INT8   ubCurLoadedState = 0;
00054 
00055 void CycleAnimations( )
00056 {
00057       INT32 cnt;
00058 
00059       // FInd the next animation with start height the same...
00060       for ( cnt = usStartAnim + 1; cnt < NUMANIMATIONSTATES; cnt++ )
00061       {
00062             if ( gAnimControl[ cnt ].ubHeight == ubStartHeight )
00063             {
00064                   usStartAnim = ( UINT8) cnt;
00065                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, usStartAnim, 0 , TRUE );
00066                   return;
00067             }
00068       }
00069 
00070       usStartAnim = 0;
00071       EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, usStartAnim, 0 , TRUE );
00072 }

00092 UINT32  AniEditScreenHandle(void)
00093 {
00094   InputAtom                         InputEvent;
00095       static BOOLEAN          fFirstTime = TRUE;
00096       static UINT16                 usOldState;
00097       static BOOLEAN          fToggle = FALSE;
00098       static BOOLEAN          fToggle2 = FALSE;
00099 
00100 //    EV_S_SETPOSITION SSetPosition;
00101 
00102       // Make backups
00103       if ( fFirstTime )
00104       {
00105             gfAniEditMode = TRUE;
00106 
00107             usStartAnim   = 0;
00108             ubStartHeight = ANIM_STAND;
00109 
00110             fFirstTime = FALSE;
00111             fToggle            = FALSE;

00116

00118       
00119             EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, usStartAnim, 0 , TRUE );
00120 
00121             BuildListFile( );

00123       }
00124 
00125       
00126 
00127       /////////////////////////////////////////////////////                         
00128       StartFrameBufferRender( );
00129 
00130       RenderWorld( );

00133 
00134 
00135       /////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00136       EndFrameBufferRender( );

00139       SetFont( LARGEFONT1 );
00140       mprintf( 0,0,L"SOLDIER ANIMATION VIEWER" );
00141       gprintfdirty( (INT16)0,(INT16)0,L"SOLDIER ANIMATION VIEWER" );
00142 
00143 
00144       mprintf( 0,20,L"Current Animation: %S %S", gAnimControl[ usStartAnim ].zAnimStr, gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ pSoldier->usAnimSurface ].Filename );

00149       {
00150             case ANIM_STAND:
00151 
00152                   mprintf( 0,40,L"Current Stance: STAND" );
00153                   break;
00154 
00155             case ANIM_CROUCH:

00159

00161

00163                   break;
00164       }

00166 
00167 
00168       if ( fToggle )
00169       {
00170             mprintf( 0,60,L"FORCE ON" );
00171             gprintfdirty( (INT16)0,(INT16)60,L"FORCE OFF" );
00172       }
00173 
00174       if ( fToggle2 )
00175       {
00176             mprintf( 0,70,L"LOADED ORDER ON" );
00177             gprintfdirty( (INT16)0,(INT16)70,L"LOADED ORDER ON" );
00178 
00179             mprintf( 0,90,L"LOADED ORDER : %S", gAnimControl[ pusStates[ ubCurLoadedState ] ].zAnimStr );
00180             gprintfdirty( (INT16)0,(INT16)90,L"LOADED ORDER : %S", gAnimControl[ pusStates[ ubCurLoadedState ] ].zAnimStr );
00181 
00182       }
00183 
00184   if (DequeueEvent(&InputEvent) == TRUE)
00185   {
00186     if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN)&&(InputEvent.usParam == ESC))
00187     { 
00188                    fFirstTime = TRUE;
00189 
00190                    gfAniEditMode = FALSE;
00191 
00192              fFirstTimeInGameScreen = TRUE;
00193 
00194                    gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= (~LOADING_SAVED_GAME);
00195 
00196                    if ( fOKFiles )
00197                    {
00198                                MemFree( pusStates );
00199                    }
00200 
00201                    fOKFiles = FALSE;
00202 
00203                    return( GAME_SCREEN );             
00204     }
00205 
00206             if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP) && (InputEvent.usParam == SPACE ))
00207             {
00208                   if ( !fToggle && !fToggle2 )
00209                   {
00210                         CycleAnimations( );
00211                   }
00212             }
00213 
00214             if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP) && (InputEvent.usParam == 's' ))
00215             {
00216                   if ( !fToggle )
00217                   {
00218                         UINT16 usAnim=0;
00219                         usOldState = usStartAnim;
00220 
00221                         switch( ubStartHeight )
00222                         {
00223                               case ANIM_STAND:
00224 
00225                                     usAnim = STANDING;
00226                                     break;
00227 
00228                               case ANIM_CROUCH:
00229 
00230                                     usAnim = CROUCHING;
00231                                     break;
00232 
00233                               case ANIM_PRONE:
00234 
00235                                     usAnim = PRONE;
00236                                     break;
00237                         }
00238                         
00239                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, usAnim, 0 , TRUE );
00240                   }
00241                   else
00242                   {
00243                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, usOldState, 0 , TRUE );
00244                   }
00245 
00246                   fToggle = !fToggle;
00247             }
00248 
00249             if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP) && (InputEvent.usParam == 'l' ))
00250             {
00251                   if ( !fToggle2 )
00252                   {
00253                         usOldState = usStartAnim;
00254 
00255                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, pusStates[ ubCurLoadedState ], 0 , TRUE );
00256                   }
00257                   else
00258                   {
00259                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, usOldState, 0 , TRUE );
00260                   }
00261 
00262                   fToggle2 = !fToggle2;
00263             }
00264 
00265 
00266             if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP) && (InputEvent.usParam == PGUP ))
00267             {
00268                    if ( fOKFiles && fToggle2 )
00269                    {
00270                               ubCurLoadedState++;
00271 
00272                               if ( ubCurLoadedState == ubNumStates )
00273                               {
00274                                     ubCurLoadedState = 0;
00275                               }
00276 
00277                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, pusStates[ ubCurLoadedState ], 0 , TRUE );
00278 
00279                    }
00280             }
00281 
00282 
00283             if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP) && (InputEvent.usParam == PGDN ))
00284             {
00285                    if ( fOKFiles && fToggle2 )
00286                    {
00287                               ubCurLoadedState--;
00288 
00289                               if ( ubCurLoadedState == 0 )
00290                               {
00291                                     ubCurLoadedState = ubNumStates;
00292                               }
00293 
00294                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, pusStates[ ubCurLoadedState ], 0 , TRUE );
00295                    }
00296             }
00297 
00298             if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP) && (InputEvent.usParam == 'c' ))
00299             {
00300                   // CLEAR!
00301                   usStartAnim = 0;
00302                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, usStartAnim, 0 , TRUE );
00303             }
00304 
00305             if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP) && (InputEvent.usParam == ENTER ))
00306             {
00307                   if ( ubStartHeight == ANIM_STAND )
00308                   {
00309                         ubStartHeight = ANIM_CROUCH;
00310                   }
00311                   else if ( ubStartHeight == ANIM_CROUCH )
00312                   {
00313                         ubStartHeight = ANIM_PRONE;
00314                   }
00315                   else 
00316                   {
00317                         ubStartHeight = ANIM_STAND;
00318                   }
00319             }
00320 
00321   }
00322 
00323       
00324   return( ANIEDIT_SCREEN );
00325 
00326 }

00328 
00329 UINT16 GetAnimStateFromName( INT8 *zName )
00330 {
00331       INT32 cnt;
00332 
00333       // FInd the next animation with start height the same...
00334       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUMANIMATIONSTATES; cnt++ )
00335       {
00336             if ( _stricmp( gAnimControl[ cnt ].zAnimStr, zName ) == 0 )
00337             {
00338                   return( (UINT16) cnt );
00339             }
00340       }
00341 
00342       return( 5555 );
00343 }

00345 
00346 void BuildListFile( )
00347 {
00348       FILE *infoFile;
00349       char currFilename[128];
00350       int numEntries = 0;
00351       int   cnt;
00352       UINT16 usState;
00353       INT16 zError[128];
00354       
00355 
00356       //Verify the existance of the header text file.
00357       infoFile = fopen( "ANITEST.DAT", "rb");
00358       if(!infoFile)
00359       {
00360             return;
00361       }
00362       //count STIs inside header and verify each one's existance.
00363       while( !feof( infoFile ) )
00364       {
00365             fgets( currFilename, 128, infoFile );
00366             //valid entry in header, continue on...
00367 
00368             numEntries++;
00369       }
00370       fseek( infoFile, 0, SEEK_SET ); //reset header file 
00371 
00372       // Allocate array
00373       pusStates = (UINT16 *) MemAlloc( sizeof( UINT16 ) * numEntries );
00374 
00375       fOKFiles = TRUE;
00376 
00377       cnt = 0;
00378       while( !feof( infoFile ) )
00379       {
00380             fgets( currFilename, 128, infoFile );
00381 
00382             // Remove newline
00383             currFilename[ strlen( currFilename ) -1 ] = '\0';
00384             currFilename[ strlen( currFilename ) -1 ] = '\0';
00385 
00386             usState = GetAnimStateFromName( (INT8 *)currFilename );
00387 
00388             if ( usState != 5555 )
00389             {
00390                   cnt++;
00391                   ubNumStates = (UINT8)cnt;
00392                   pusStates[ cnt ] = usState;
00393             }
00394             else
00395             {
00396                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)zError, (wchar_t *)L"Animation str %S is not known: ", currFilename );
00397                   DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zError, ANIEDIT_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, NULL, NULL );
00398                   fclose( infoFile );
00399                   return;
00400             }
00401       }
00402 
00403 }
